{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05135v1", "title": "Generalized modular equations and arithmetic properties of singular
  values of Hauptmoduln", "summary": "In this paper, we study the CM values of Hauptmoduln whose Fourier
coefficients are cyclotomic integers,
  and prove that these are algebraic integers, analogous to the classical
singular moduli of the elliptic modular j-function.
  The main tool for our proof is generalized modular equations for Hauptmoduln,
introduced by Cummins-Gannon.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-08T11:13:11Z"}
